WorkItem.Description:
Description: Resetting item cache throws an exception
Steps to Reproduce:
Launch WPF version of Rawr
Options -> Reset Item Cache
Observe the Exception
Â 
Additional Information:
Rawr 4.0.16 (Jan 16, 2011) [r57235]
Windows 7 x64 RTM
Exception has been thrown by the target of an invocation.
There is an error in XML document (0, 0).

Comments.Message: You have a bad set of caches, redownload Rawr
Deleted old installation and downloaded latest.  It's still generating the exception.

WPF has some problems extracting from the zip file. I think it depends on the software used to create the zip file containing the xmls, some seem to be incompatible with the zip extraction method we're using.

Actually it's trying to pull zip from some old Rawr3 era location, I'll change that to use the included zip file if it'll work. It won't work if they explicitely delete the zip file, but it should at least allow for a reset if you want to revert any manual changes to items.
